lines.text: create integer array a with size 800
for i = 0 to n exclusive , read a [ i ]
lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { cin >> a [ i ] ; }

lines.text: for i = n to 2 * n exclusive , set a [ i ] to a [ i - n ]
lines.code: for ( int i = n ; i < 2 * n ; i ++ ) { a [ i ] = a [ i - n ] ; }

lines.text: for i = 1 to 2 * n exclusive , set a [ i ] to a [ i ] + a [ i - 1 ]
lines.code: for ( int i = 1 ; i < 2 * n ; i ++ ) { a [ i ] = a [ i ] + a [ i - 1 ] ; }

lines.text: create integers begin , end , c with begin = 0
create integer min with min = 1 bitshift left 20
while begin is less than n
for i = begin to end exclusive
lines.code: for ( int i = begin ; i < end ; i ++ )

lines.text: set c to absolute value of ( ( a [ i + 1 ] - a [ begin ] ) - ( a [ end ] - a [ i + 1 ] ) )
lines.code: c = abs ( ( a [ i + 1 ] - a [ begin ] ) - ( a [ end ] - a [ i + 1 ] ) ) ;

lines.text: if c is less than or equal to min , set min to c
